alert.note: Alert for Emmet; Kossuth; Palo Alto (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 6:15PM CDT until May 12 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Emmet County in northwestern Iowa... Western Kossuth County in north central Iowa... Palo Alto County in northwestern Iowa... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 614 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Heron Lake to near Orleans to near Greenville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Silver Lake, Rush Lake, Lost Island Lake, Ruthven, Ayrshire, Lost Island Lake State Park, Okamanpedan Lake, Emmetsburg Municipal Airport, Okamanpedan State Park, Emmetsburg, Five Island Lake, Kearney State Park, Cylinder, Rodman, Whittemore, Fenton and Lone Rock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across Northwest Iowa. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. In addition, blowing dust may lower visibilities to near zero with this gust front. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
